roleset.name: to wake or make aware

example.name: both args
example.text: Edward Carlson awoke one morning last month [*-1] to find eight holes in his front yard where his prized miniature palms, called cycads, once stood.
example.arg: [*-1] to find eight holes in his front yard where his prized miniature palms, called cycads, once stood

roleset.note: Member of Vncls appear-48.1.1, other_cos-45.4. Basically the same as awaken but cannot take an agent.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'awake' based on sentences in wsj.
